remarks: Homomorphic property of composites.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Aug-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2015.)
statement:
gsumwcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumccat.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumccat $p |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ W e. Word B /\ X e. Word B ) -> ( G gsum ( W concat X ) ) = ( ( G gsum W ) .+ ( G gsum X ) ) ) $.
